SimpleDataListSpec.Name: Sponsorship Reason Data List
SimpleDataListSpec.Description: List of all the sponsorship reasons.
SimpleDataListSpec.Author: Jason Foster

SPSimpleList.common:CreateProcedureSQL: create procedure dbo.USR_USP_SIMPLEDATALIST_SPONSORSHIPREASONS as select ID as VALUE, REASON as LABEL from dbo.SPONSORSHIPREASON where REASONTYPECODE in (5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 11) order by REASON
